content: the perfect crochet cardigan does more than keep you warm it makes a statement in casual style full of personality in lively shades of caron anniversary cakes this garment is worked in the round in 3 double_crochet granny cluster stitch with the main body created using 2 hexagonal pieces that are folded and seamed to create an open front design additional rounds and row on the arms and hem add just the right length while ribbed cuffs finish the sleeves with a touch of gathered polish dressed up or down this sweater is sure to become a wardrobe staple materials caron® anniversary cakes™ 35 3 oz/1000 g 1061 yds/970 m sizes xs/s m/l lemon chiffon 47078 1 2 cake s sizes xl/2/3xl 4/5xl lemon chiffon 47078 2 2 cakes sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m/l 36-42 91 5-106 5 cm xl/2/3xl 44-54 112-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
